imdb.plot outline: Bleacher Report's eStream is a daily news show covering all things eSports. Michele Morrow and Malik Forte break down everything in the world of competitive gaming from interviews with athletes and developers, previewing upcoming tournaments, event coverage, latest patches and updates, and so much more.
imdb.title: Bleacher Report eStream
